intro: Oldenlandia yunnanensis, commonly known as the Yunnan spiderwort, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae and is characterized by its small, white or pale yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments, such as forests and mountainous regions. It has heart-shaped leaves and produces small, clustered inflorescences. Oldenlandia yunnanensis is often used in traditional Chinese medicine for its purported health benefits.
